Name: Itchy Scratchy
About the game: A person approaches you with a simple request: 'Friend! I have itch, scratch for me?' How can you resist? They seem so nice, so itchy, and oh so scratchable. A simple point-and-click game, itchy scratchy is a short shock/horror title with an emphasis on speedrunning. WARNING! This game is very short and will leave you dissatisfied, wanting more in a bad way. I don't feel like adding anything new to the game because the code is a mess. But, hey, it's free. Play at your own risk.
